property.name: PostCount
property.formula: (SELECT count(a.ID) FROM Article a WHERE a.NewsGroupID = ID AND a.Cancelled = 0 AND a.Pending = 0)

property.name: LowWatermark
property.formula: (SELECT min(a.Number) FROM Article a WHERE a.NewsGroupID = ID)

property.name: HighWatermark
property.formula: (SELECT max(a.Number) FROM Article a WHERE a.NewsGroupID = ID)
